Name: Key Lime Pie #3
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled, rimmed glass.
Review: My favourite rendition of this dessert-in-a-glass cocktail. To make the pie rim - wipe with cream mix and dip into crushed Graham Crackers or digestive biscuits.
History: Recipe adapted from one by Claire Smith in 2005, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Key Lime Pie #3 contains 194 calories
